channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OTD In Space - May 22: SpaceX Launches 1st Private Cargo Mission To The International Space Station
Home Depot struggles to reverse concerning customer behavior
Kim Jong Un’s fury after watching North Korea’s new navy destroyer crippled in botched launch
Small Plane Crashes into Neighborhood, Igniting Fires in 15 Homes and Leaving Jet Fuel 'All Over'
Microsoft fires employee who interrupted CEO's speech to protest AI tech for Israeli military
Trump administration bars Harvard from enrolling international students
item.description: The Trump administration has barred Harvard from allowing international students to enroll at the university.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump’s orders to dismantle the Education Department and fire employees
Woman found guilty of stowing away on Delta flight from New York to Paris
item.description: Svetlana Dali was found guilty Thursday of stowing away on a Delta flight from New York to Paris last year.

item.title: Tax bill passed by House Republicans would gut Biden-era clean energy tax credits
Trump admin live updates: Trump celebrates the passage of 'One, Big, Beautiful Bill'
item.description: President Trump celebrated the House of Representatives' passage of "THE ONE, BIG, BEAUTIFUL BILL."

item.title: 2 Israeli Embassy staff shot and killed outside Jewish Museum in D.C.
item.description: The victims, Yaron Lischinsky and Sarah Lynn Milgrim, were a couple about to become engaged, said Israel's ambassador to the U.S., Yechiel Leiter.

item.title: New Social Security chief tells staff he had to Google the job when he was offered it
item.description: Newly sworn-in Social Security chief Frank Bisignano, who previously was a Wall Street executive, told staffers he had to Google the SSA job when it w...

item.title: Fact-checking Trump's White South African genocide allegations
item.description: President Trump made several claims on Wednesday that White South African farmers are experiencing genocide. CBS News political reporter Aaron Navarro...

item.title: Navy reverses course on DEI book ban after Pentagon review
item.description: Almost all 381 books the Naval Academy removed from its libraries have been returned to shelves after new review using Pentagon's standardized DEI sea...

item.title: San Diego plane crash into military housing neighborhood leaves multiple people dead, police say
item.description: Two people are dead and eight others are injured after a small plane crashed in San Diego, officials say.

item.title: NOAA predicts above-normal Atlantic hurricane season
item.description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration issued its predictions for the Atlantic hurricane season. CBS News' Karen Hua reports.

item.title: Multiple people on private plane that crashed into San Diego neighborhood are dead, authorities say
item.description: Authorities say a private jet crashed into military housing in San Diego during foggy weather, igniting cars parked along a suburban neighborhood bloc...

item.title: Antisemitic incidents spike in U.S. since start of Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The U.S. has seen a spike in reported antisemitic attacks since the start of the Israel-Hamas war. 2024 had the highest number of reported antisemitic...
